Simple Log
org.grlea.log Simple Log: the simple way to log.
(See this package's description for the documentation.)

 

Simple Log Rollover
org.grlea.log.rollover Classes used to implement rolling of log files on a periodic basis.

 

Adapters
org.grlea.log.adapters.commons An adapter for using SimpleLog as the provider for Jakarta Commons Logging.
org.grlea.log.adapters.slf4j An adapter for using SimpleLog as the provider for SLF4J.
